column4: Need help in mplayer: http://pastebin.com/d72904181 I don't know what this guy means. I'm not an mplayer expert. I'm the rocketguy in that conversation.
he means to shut down any instance of the pulse, esd, arts, and jack sound deamons
How? I couldn't figure that out
How? I'm a lunix noob and not familiar with mplayer
see the manual page for kill
I told you already: man kill
How do I kill those instances through mplayer? That MAN KILL explained nothing useful.
it should explain how to kill a process
so in mplayer its: mplayer -kill RIGHT
how do i shut down instances of pulse, esd, arts, and jack sound deamons
check to see if they're running using ps aux | grep name-of-daemon
where name-of-daemon is pulse, esd, arts, or jack
alternative option: use system > administration > system monitor
